entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0047.7481] In the company's extension taxonomy the concept TOTAL NET CASH USED IN OPERATING ACTIVITIES includes us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInContinuingOperations as a summation-child. The concept us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInContinuingOperations should not appear as a child of NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivities because it does not have a balance type. Increase (Decrease) items without balance attributes are used in a roll forward and should not be used in the cash flow statement as they represent the impact on the balance sheet item which is the opposite of the impact on cash.
Rule Element Id:7481 Rule version: 26.0.9 -
